page.title: 04Farming - Tannerswhite
page.content: Tannerswhite Farm is situated in Norwood End. The farmhouse dates back to the l6th century. It is at present occupied by Mr. East who has farmed the area for 59 years. He owns l5O acres, 75 under wheat and 65 barley, 10 acres, potatoes. He grows rhubarb, broad beans and cabbage in his garden. He breeds pigs for sale (Large White and Welsh). There is one boar, 20 sows and 60 - 100 young pigs. Mr. East does not employ anyone but works in partnership with Mr. Wilkinson. The farming equipment consists of 1 combine harvester, potato planter, potato grader, seed drill, spraying machine and 3 Massey Ferguson tractors. Mr. East considers the most important changes he has seen to be the mechanisation of farming methods.
